productInfo.name: OneMap App
productInfo.description: A mobile application providing comprehensive mapping and location-based services, potentially including features like real-time traffic, amenities search, route planning, and government services integration.

marketAnalysis.trend: Use of location-based services and hyper-local information is increasing. Visual walkthroughs and tutorials of apps are popular on social media, especially when highlighting time-saving and problem-solving capabilities.
marketAnalysis.insight: Focus on highlighting unique features of OneMap App that differentiate it from competitors and cater to specific user needs. Short, visually engaging content that demonstrates ease of use and practical applications will perform well.
